page.title: 07CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: In summer I like riding my BMX bike.I sometimes go on the track on the Forest.Before I go I have to check my brakes and chain for faults.When I get back I have to clean it as it gets very dirty.Indoors I usually play on my computer.I have lots of games.Some- times I watch TV or go into the garage to maintain my bike.In the school yard I usually play cricket.We use the lamp post as one wicket and the edge of the wall as the other.If the ball touches the far wall it is a six and if it goes over the line it is a four.Some- times we play dobby ball.One person tries to hit the other person with the ball to make them on.Some people play marbles.They use the grates in the yard,but everyone argues about who has won.
